Pre-Game Insights: The matchup Friday is the 11th time these teams match up this season. The Twins hold a 7-3 advantage in the season series.
Kansas City has a 76-65 record overall and a 42-30 record at home.
The Royals have a 55-29 record in games when they record at least eight hits.
Minnesota has a 37-34 record on the road and a 76-64 record overall.
The Twins have a 32-15 record in games when they hit two or more home runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Carlos Santana has 24 doubles and 20 home runs while hitting.238 for the Twins.
Kyle Farmer is 4-for-17 with two home runs over the last 10 games.
Bobby Witt Jr. has 40 doubles, 11 triples and 30 home runs for the Royals.
